item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

After the successful sleeping bag drive last week, we, Boston Volunteers decided to make one more move to help the homeless.

We got appreciations, good stories and suggestions from the last drive. Lot of the homeless were asking for Under wears and socks which we didnt have last time.

This time we will buy some Underwears and socks individually and give it to them.

Also, we will serve some Coffee and snacks as well during the drive.

Here is the plan:

Please bring some snacks like Cookies, Chips, soda etc to the event for serving.

Please buy some Men/Women underwears and socks and bring them to the event (this is critical, didnt want to put this as event title)

Bring some money so that we can buy coffee to the homeless (I am thinking 1 volunteer will take care of one homeless)

Please RSVP if you like to donate money or under garments or food. Meet us at the J J Foley's Bar and Grill, 21 Kingston Street, Boston On Jan 26, a few blocks away from Downtown Crossing.

We will eat dinner and walk around in the streets and meet the homeless.

Best regards!

Freddy

P.S. This event is not through a partnership organization, we, Boston Volunteers, are organizing this by ourselves.

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Serve DD Coffee and snacks to Homeless
